languages.text: "И не говори. У меня от нее мороз по коже. Стремная на вид, говорит странно, а с оружием обращается... я, кстати, впервые такое ружье вижу. Интересно, откуда?"

traits.locale_text: "Да этот урод, кем бы он ни был, как сквозь землю провалился. Наши только и нашли, что грязные следы, и все".

languages.text: "Tell me about it. She gives me the creeps. She's terrifying to look at, she talks funny, and she knows her way around a gun... Come to think of it, I've never seen that kind of weapon before. I wonder where she got it."
languages.original_text: "И не говори. У меня от нее мороз по коже. Стремная на вид, говорит странно, а с оружием обращается... я, кстати, впервые такое ружье вижу. Интересно, откуда?"

traits.locale_text: "Tell me about it. She gives me the creeps. She's terrifying to look at, she talks funny, and she knows her way around a gun... Come to think of it, I've never seen that kind of weapon before. I wonder where she got it."

"Tell me about it. She gives me the creeps. She's terrifying to look at, she talks funny, and she knows her way around a gun... Come to think of it, I've never seen that kind of weapon before. I wonder where she got it."

"Tell me about it. She gives me the creeps. She's terrifying to look at, she talks funny, and she knows her way around a gun... Come to think of it, I've never seen that kind of weapon before. I wonder where she got it."

"Tell me about it. She gives me the creeps. She's terrifying to look at, she talks funny, and she knows her way around a gun... Come to think of it, I've never seen that kind of weapon before. I wonder where she got it."

languages.text: 「その話を聞きたい。あの人は不気味だよ。見るのは怖いし、おかしなことを言うし、銃には精通してるし…。考えてみれば、あんな武器は見たことないし。どこから来たんだろう」
languages.original_text: "Tell me about it. She gives me the creeps. She's terrifying to look at, she talks funny, and she knows her way around a gun... Come to think of it, I've never seen that kind of weapon before. I wonder where she got it."

traits.locale_text: 「その話を聞きたい。あの人は不気味だよ。見るのは怖いし、おかしなことを言うし、銃には精通してるし…。考えてみれば、あんな武器は見たことないし。どこから来たんだろう」

languages.text: “可不是嘛。她的样子很吓人，让我毛骨悚然。她说话的语气也很古怪，还很会用枪……仔细想想，我以前从没见过那种武器，不知道她是从哪儿弄来的。”
languages.original_text: "Tell me about it. She gives me the creeps. She's terrifying to look at, she talks funny, and she knows her way around a gun... Come to think of it, I've never seen that kind of weapon before. I wonder where she got it."

traits.locale_text: “可不是嘛。她的样子很吓人，让我毛骨悚然。她说话的语气也很古怪，还很会用枪……仔细想想，我以前从没见过那种武器，不知道她是从哪儿弄来的。”

languages.text: «Y que lo digas. Me pone los pelos de punta. Es aterradora, habla raro y maneja las armas como nadie... Ahora que lo pienso, nunca había visto una como la suya. Me pregunto de dónde la habrá sacado».
languages.original_text: "Tell me about it. She gives me the creeps. She's terrifying to look at, she talks funny, and she knows her way around a gun... Come to think of it, I've never seen that kind of weapon before. I wonder where she got it."

traits.locale_text: «Y que lo digas. Me pone los pelos de punta. Es aterradora, habla raro y maneja las armas como nadie... Ahora que lo pienso, nunca había visto una como la suya. Me pregunto de dónde la habrá sacado».

languages.text: "Das könnt Ihr laut sagen. Mir macht sie Angst. Sie ist ein furchterregender Anblick, spricht komisch und kann mit Waffen umgehen ... Und überhaupt, so eine Waffe habe ich noch nie zuvor gesehen. Wo sie die wohl herhat?"
languages.original_text: "Tell me about it. She gives me the creeps. She's terrifying to look at, she talks funny, and she knows her way around a gun... Come to think of it, I've never seen that kind of weapon before. I wonder where she got it."

traits.locale_text: "Das könnt Ihr laut sagen. Mir macht sie Angst. Sie ist ein furchterregender Anblick, spricht komisch und kann mit Waffen umgehen ... Und überhaupt, so eine Waffe habe ich noch nie zuvor gesehen. Wo sie die wohl herhat?"

languages.text: « Ne m'en parlez pas, elle me donne la chair de poule... Elle fait peur à voir, elle parle bizarrement et elle sait se servir d'un fusil... D'ailleurs, je n'avais jamais vu ce genre d'arme. Je me demande où elle l'a trouvée. »
languages.original_text: "Tell me about it. She gives me the creeps. She's terrifying to look at, she talks funny, and she knows her way around a gun... Come to think of it, I've never seen that kind of weapon before. I wonder where she got it."

traits.locale_text: « Ne m'en parlez pas, elle me donne la chair de poule... Elle fait peur à voir, elle parle bizarrement et elle sait se servir d'un fusil... D'ailleurs, je n'avais jamais vu ce genre d'arme. Je me demande où elle l'a trouvée. »

languages.text: "Bir de bana sor. Tüylerimi diken diken ediyor. Görünüşü korkutucu, konuşması abuk subuk, nasıl silah kullanacağını da iyi biliyor. Sahi, öyle bir silahı da daha önce görmemiştim. Kim bilir nereden buldu..."
languages.original_text: "Tell me about it. She gives me the creeps. She's terrifying to look at, she talks funny, and she knows her way around a gun... Come to think of it, I've never seen that kind of weapon before. I wonder where she got it."

traits.locale_text: "Bir de bana sor. Tüylerimi diken diken ediyor. Görünüşü korkutucu, konuşması abuk subuk, nasıl silah kullanacağını da iyi biliyor. Sahi, öyle bir silahı da daha önce görmemiştim. Kim bilir nereden buldu?"
